title: Scenario
description: Describe a situation or experience you faced. AuraSense will analyze it and highlight any harmful, abusive, or psychologically impactful elements.

title: Conversation
description: Upload an audio file of a conversation between people. AuraSense detects abusive, toxic, or manipulative language from both sides of the conversation.

title: Document
description: Upload a document. AuraSense will analyze it and highlight any abusive, harmful, or manipulative sections that could affect readers mental health.

title: Video
description: Upload a video file. AuraSense will analyze the content and highlight any abusive, harmful, or manipulative language or behavior that could negatively affect viewers' mental health.
